item.title: By: Yonatan
item.dc:creator: Yonatan
item.description:
Presumably the reason why scholars and mystics play up Rabbeinu Bahye ibn Pakuda and the descendants of Maimonides is because they had a stronger impact on Judaism than Chacham Siman Tov Melammed.
Several years ago, Prof. Marc Shapiro was playing up 20th century Moroccan Halakha as a way of entering Modernity without the polemical aspects of 20th century European and American Psak.
I wonder if North Africa could become the next Italy as an alternative Judaism to the status quos.
